attributes.action: Force the London 2012 Olympic commitee to revert back to the original logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new logo is hideous. It has nothing to do with London, does not use Olympic colours, and does not represent in any way the spirit of the Games or the London people.

The previous logo helped London to win the olympic bid and so let's keep it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
